mapper.insert: insert into auction_main values( auction_seq.nextval, #{auction_nm}, #{auction_info}, sysdate, #{auction_addr1}, #{auction_start}, #{auction_end}, #{auction_type}, #{auction_post}, #{auction_addr2}, #{auction_image} )
mapper.select: select * from auction_main order by auction_sq desc

select X.* from ( select rownum as rn, A.* from (
select * from auction_main order by auction_nm asc, auction_sq desc) A
select * from auction_main order by auction_nm desc, auction_sq desc) A
select * from auction_main order by auction_type desc, auction_sq desc) A
select * from auction_main order by auction_type asc, auction_sq desc) A
select * from auction_main order by auction_sq asc) A
select * from auction_main order by auction_sq desc) A
where rownum <= #{page.endIndex}) X where X.rn >= #{page.startIndex}

select X.* from ( select rownum as rn, A.* from ( select * from auction_main where UPPER(${searchType}) like '%'||UPPER(#{searchKey})||'%'
order by auction_nm asc, auction_sq desc) A
order by auction_nm desc, auction_sq desc) A
order by auction_type desc, auction_sq desc) A
order by auction_type asc, auction_sq desc) A
order by auction_sq asc) A
order by auction_sq desc) A
where rownum <= #{page.endIndex}) X where X.rn >= #{page.startIndex}
select count(*) from auction_main where UPPER(${searchType}) like '%'||UPPER(#{searchKey})||'%'
select auction_start from auction_main where auction_sq=#{auction_sq}
select auction_end from auction_main where auction_sq=#{auction_sq}
select art_no as art_sq from auction_art where auction_no=#{auction_sq} order by desc art_no
mapper.update: update auction_main set auction_nm=#{auction_nm}, auction_info=#{auction_info}, auction_addr1=#{auction_addr1}, auction_start=#{auction_start}, auction_end=#{auction_end}, auction_type=#{auction_type}, auction_post=#{auction_post}, auction_addr2=#{auction_addr2}, auction_image=#{auction_image} where auction_sq=#{auction_sq}
